name: You Are My Universe Demo
description:
This is an extremely early DEMO of my game. Many items may be changed in the final version.

A blinding red light. And then, everyone died. Everyone died, except for us.

Play as Carol, a young highschool girl, living a shocking new life after an explosion ruined the surrounding area, killing millions. How did this happen? Why did this happen? Who could do such a thing? None of those questions can be answered. 

"So then, how will I survive...?"

SurvivalxFantasyxSoL Kinetic Visual Novel.

TRIGGER WARNINGS: A shot of a corpse's hands. Depictions of Violence. Blood.
